channel.title: [Release] Nick's Autoclicker
channel.description:
Current Version: 1.0 1.0 Jar Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2gm3hps7j22s7bs]AutoClicker.jar[/url] Git: [url=https://github.com/Nick-/AutoClicker]https://github.com/Nick-/AutoClicker[/url] Description: A lightwieght cross-platform autoclicker that can preform click sequences at specified intervals.
[u]Known Issues[/u]
- Be wary when setting a low sleep interval while looping infinite times. F1 will only stop the autoclicker if the Frame is in focus. The frame, however, does come into focus upon mouse entry.
[IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/5595/sautoclicker10001.png[/img]
Please comment below to report any issues you might find.
All suggestions are welcome and encouraged.
Also.. is there currently any way to change one's name on this forum? I believe I asked an admin a while back, and he said that a feature was going to be implemented.

item.title: [Release] Nick's Autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:474143”][quote author=gara494 link=topic=592080.msg4184506#msg4184506 date=1355960476]

Stay away from that formbuilder like the plague.

Noted.
It’s quite a hassle, but is there anything else you would recommend using?
[/quote]

Doing it line by line? That’s how I write all my GUI code, because builders (while useful) are just horrid, because every action it taken literally, even if it’s a default value (minimum size, maximum, etc).[/quote]

True true I guess I’m just lazy

Read full topic

Stay away from that formbuilder like the plague.
[/quote]

It’s quite a hassle, but is there anything else you would recommend using?[/quote]

Doing it line by line? That’s how I write all my GUI code, because builders (while useful) are just horrid, because every action it taken literally, even if it’s a default value (minimum size, maximum, etc).

item.title: [Release] Nick's Autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

imthenull:

that font sure is ugly.

Agreed.

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:5, topic:474143”][quote=imthenull]
that font sure is ugly.
[/quote]Swing always looks like un-native garbage.[/quote]

Agreed.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:7, topic:474143”]Stay away from that formbuilder like the plague.

also

                                if (currentLoopNumber == LoopNumber) {                                    running = false;                                    this.cancel();                                    g.status.setText("Finished");                                    currentLoopNumber = 0;                                    currentQueNumber = 0;                                    return;                                }

can go into

} else { g.completedLoops.setText("Loops: " + (currentLoopNumber) + "/" + LoopNumber); } [/quote]

Agreed. Also, is a headjob out of the question?
xx

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Nick's Autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent

@silabsoft wrote:

Stay away from that formbuilder like the plague.

also

                                if (currentLoopNumber == LoopNumber) {                                    running = false;                                    this.cancel();                                    g.status.setText("Finished");                                    currentLoopNumber = 0;                                    currentQueNumber = 0;                                    return;                                }

can go into

                               } else {                                    g.completedLoops.setText("Loops: " + (currentLoopNumber) + "/" + LoopNumber);                                }

item.title: [Release] Nick's Autoclicker
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

Current Version: 1.0
1.0 Jar Download Link: AutoClicker.jar
Git: https://github.com/Nick-/AutoClicker
Description: A lightwieght cross-platform autoclicker that can preform click sequences at specified intervals.

Known Issues

  • Be wary when setting a low sleep interval while looping infinite times. F1 will only stop the autoclicker if the Frame is in focus. The frame, however, does come into focus upon mouse entry.

Please comment below to report any issues you might find.

All suggestions are welcome and encouraged.

Also… is there currently any way to change one’s name on this forum? I believe I asked an admin a while back, and he said that a feature was going to be implemented.

Read full topic
